import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-hw43', templateUrl: './hw43.component.html', styleUrls: ['./hw43.component.css'], }) export class Hw43Component { showPassword = false; logToogle = []; toogleDetails() { this.showPassword = !this.showPassword; this.logToogle.push(this.logToogle.length + 1); } }
